polytech.devint.view.sound

Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • polytech.devint.util.Identifiable<java.lang.Integer>
      • polytech.devint.view.sound.Sound

  • public class Sound
extends Identifiable<java.lang.Integer>
    Represent a sound. The sound data are stored (raw) such as it is faster to play it again, it is not reloaded each play. Support only wav sound. To play a sound, a sound player must be used.
    Author:
    Loris Friedel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sound(java.io.File waveFile)
      Create a playable sound from a .wav file
